sections.text: Before implementation, or upon November 25, 2008, whichever is later, the District Department of Transportation ("DDOT") shall transmit a detailed performance parking zone plan to the Council and to the Chairs of all ANCs within a performance parking zone. The plan shall set zone-specific parking management targets and shall detail parking changes, which may include new parking restrictions and curbside parking fees.

At the request of any ANC or Ward Councilmember representing all or part of a performance parking zone, DDOT shall conduct public meetings to provide an update on parking management targets and an opportunity for public comment.
The Mayor shall provide quarterly reports to the Council and make the reports available on its website detailing the following information for each performance parking zone:
Quarterly revenue associated with performance parking meter pricing;
Quarterly expenditures on non-automobile transportation improvements; and
The balance of funds available for additional non-automobile transportation investments.
